MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L35 postcode area of Rainhill, affecting properties in Norbury Fold and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:52AM on 12th March 2021
